snippet: Three partners at the venture capital firm Morgenthaler Ventures are forming the Canvas Venture Fund, a new fund to make early-stage investments in software companies.
abstract: Three partners at the venture capital firm Morgenthaler Ventures are forming the Canvas Venture Fund, a new fund to make early-stage investments in software companies.

headline.main: Morgenthaler Partners Hang Out a Shingle With $175 Million Fund
